name: Jake, Zack, and Chad's Day Out
name_original: Jake, Zack, and Chad's Day Out
description:
Your best bro Chad has a really important date to go on, and has asked you to look after his pet lemming Zack and handle a few chores for him. Can you manage everything and keep Zack (or his replacements) alive before Chad returns home?

Controls are WASD to move, Spacebar to Jump, and F to interact. Use P to pause the game and open the menu.
